Title: Tight encirclement
Publisher: Tianjin meishu chubanshe (天津美术出版社)
Notes: In the first half of the 1960s, Taiwanese units were able to land on mainland soil and capture documents (and spread Republican propaganda). Hainan Island and the Fujian coast were often targeted. This poster shows how the Chinese military and popular forces were able to capture (some of) them.
